caseTitle: Sardar Arshid Hussain & others v. Mst. Zenat un Nisa & another
authorJudge: Mr. Justice Mazhar Alam Khan Miankhel
tagline: A registered deed reflecting transfer of certain rights qua a property though will have sanctity attached to it regarding its genuineness, and a stronger evidence would be required to cast aspersions on its correctness but cannot be given preference over an unregistered deed vide which physical possession of the property has also been given.
